mapper.insert: INSERT into tbl_member (uid, email, password, create_dt, created_by) VALUES (#{uid}, #{email}, #{password}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, email, name, phone, IFNULL(info, 'N') info, avatar FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE m.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member_detail (uid, name, phone, info, avatar) VALUES (#{uid}, #{detail.name}, #{detail.phone}, #{detail.info}, #{detail.avatar}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{detail.name}, phone = #{detail.phone}, info = #{detail.info}, avatar = IFNULL(#{detail.avatar}, avatar)
